channel.title: Who ever helps me gets admin on my server!
channel.description: ok, I have just downloaded obeypk source, and project czarr source. Now,I am able to log onto it with making the ip adress, 0.0.0.0 but noone else can get on it becuase thats from my local host. So, i was wondering How in the world do i do the following: First, find the ip to the server. Second, how do I host my server so other people can get on it? like make it online. If you help me, you will get a co- and some admins. reply please need bad help

item.title: Who ever helps me gets admin on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Yes, use no-ip if you canâ€™t use your ip adress.

item.title: Who ever helps me gets admin on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

If you have a wireless router then it would be alot easier just to download Hamachi and run your network that way. If you have a modem then go to no-ip.com and host your server without an IP. Which also means, you can run your server without using Hamachi. If you have any questions then message me!

Read full topic
item.source: Who ever helps me gets admin on my server!
